title: FPS drops after being 10-20 minutes ingame.
body:
Hi,

my PC is running windows 10 and the specs should be good enaugh to run league of legends for sure, which is also why I get about 100 FPS with high graphic settings when going into a game, however after about 12 minutes these fps go down to 8-20 fps for seemingly no reason at all, if I decrease the graphic settings it just takes longer, about 20 minutes, but still happens. 

Does anyone know how to fix that?

Thanks in regard!

Modaylik

replies.body:
Hey,
I hope you know you are in german boards.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 

Try disabling [GameDVR](https://www.reddit.com/r/GrandTheftAutoV_PC/comments/4c7jzd/regedit_how_to_disable_dvr_windows_10_game/). It causes problems in League atm...

> [{quoted}](name=Jhin420,realm=EUW,application-id=7hciEY9w,discussion-id=zr10AANH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-15T19:51:04.833+0000)
>
> Hey,
> I hope you know you are in german boards.
> 
> {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 
> 
> Try disabling [GameDVR](https://www.reddit.com/r/GrandTheftAutoV_PC/comments/4c7jzd/regedit_how_to_disable_dvr_windows_10_game/). It causes problems in League atm...

Oh verdammt, ich dachte das wäre generell das Forum für EUW, danke trotzdem für die Antwort, ich werde deine Lösung mal ausprobieren und mich dann mit dem Resultat melden!
